Articles.Content:
Allocating intakes to air-breathing engines in KSP is dependent on part placement order, which makes it a bit tedious to build efficiently as symmetry is trickier to use.

My request is for a plugin that can take a completed craft and reorder the intakes and engines in the optimal order within the craft file, interleaving the intakes with the engines. This would allow construction by any method the player chooses without sacrificing intake efficiency.

I believe StripSymmetry does some similar craft file manipulation, so its source might be a starting point for such a mod.
